Dragon Sceptre

one handed weapon (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 88
Dragon mastery [dragonmastery]: 1
spell [itemspell]: #496 Flame Bolt
weap id [weapon]: 151 (Wand)
damage [dmg]: -2
attack [att]: -2
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Bludgeoning Damage [blunt], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 10F to forge (F2)

This sceptre will make it easier for mages to summon and control various kind of smaller dragons. The sceptre can also be used to hurl bolts of flame in battle.
